snippet: An Islamist militant leader who has a $5 million American bounty on his head escaped during an army offensive that killed eight rebels, a military official said Tuesday.
abstract: Officials in Philippines say Isnilon Hapilon, Islamist leader of Abu Sayyaf who has $5 million American bounty on his head, was wounded but escaped during army offensive that killed eight rebels in country's south.
lead_paragraph: An Islamist militant leader who has a $5 million American bounty on his head escaped during an army offensive that killed eight rebels, a military official said Tuesday.
